svg.title: Zener Regulator — Design (Numeric)
svg.desc: Select R_s and I_Z range for VIN variation and load; verify Zener power.
svg.text: V_Z = 5.1 V; V_IN = 8–12 V; I_L = 0–50 mA; choose I_Z(min) = 5 mA; I_Z(max) ≤ 100 mA

g.text: Worst‑case low VIN, high load → ensure I_Z ≥ I_Z(min)
At VIN(min)=8 V: I_S = (8 − 5.1)/R_s; I_Z = I_S − I_L(max) ≥ 5 mA
At VIN(max)=12 V and I_L=0: I_S = (12 − 5.1)/51 ≈ 135.3 mA → I_Z ≈ 135.3 mA (too high)
Mitigate: increase R_s or restrict VIN span/load; pick R_s = 68 Ω → I_Z(max) ≈ (12 − 5.1)/68 ≈ 101 mA (borderline)
Ensure P_Z(max) = V_Z · I_Z(max) within device rating (≈ 0.52 W) → use ≥ 1 W Zener or adjust design
